Hindi The song is for my husband. I call him Hubby Shona and he calls me Madhu Shona Our story began in the most unexpected yet beautiful way‚Äîthrough Shaadi.com, thanks to our parents who believed in destiny more than we did. When I saw him for the first time on our video call, I genuinely thought he might be the strict, slightly angry type. But the moment we started talking‚Äîabout something as simple as what we do on Sundays‚ÄîI felt an instant comfort, a softness I didn‚Äôt expect. Then came our first phone call. It began with ‚Äúsorry‚Äù, followed by the cutest promise: ‚ÄúWhen we meet, I‚Äôll treat you to ice cream.‚Äù Somehow, in those small moments, I felt like I had found my whole world. Day after day, call after call, what started as an arranged match slowly turned into a bond we chose with our whole hearts. Our parents may have found the match, but we found the love. Today, I feel like the luckiest person to call him my husband‚Äîmy match made by them, but my love found by us.

Hindi From Sanyukta to Brijesh who is my life life life line jaan We met very late in life, but when we met, we met at the perfect time. There is a story in many films. A woman living in Delhi gets transferred to Lucknow by mistake for some work. She has no connection with Lucknow. She is scared.Being a Maharashtrian, she has no distant connection with Lucknow. So, she finds a number to do some work on. She keeps calling and calling, but the person on the other end doesn't pick up. One day, she receives a call and he... He gets the job done, and she thinks he's angry because he hasn't picked up her calls for a long time. After the work is done, they end the conversation by thanking each other, but the numbers remain in each other's phones. After a long time, he calls her. You check the status and react to it. She also thinks that Baba reacted to her. Then one day you will come to Delhi and tell her to meet him. She goes to meet him. He meets her in a mall. He tells her that he has some work to do tomorrow and goes to meet her. He suddenly takes her close and whispers "I love you" in her ear. She says, "I don't know who you are, but in some life, we will be together and have a lot of fun." And being very emotional, we ask together, that voice, that touch, that breath, that heartbeat, she falls in love with him and says yes to him and he falls in love endlessly. A story of many films. Also, the song is expected. Both are very different. He is from Lucknow and she is from Maharashtra. But since they live in Delhi, they have no connection to each other even though they are from Delhi. Universe got each other in a filmy dramatic style. In the same way that God creates paths for those who are destined to meet, the fact that she is going to Lucknow to commit murder without any connection and ends up on his table is a very beautiful coincidence, and it is only The universe created it so that these two could meet.

Hindi-English The song is for my husband Jatin. The song is from me, his wife Charu. He calls me Chau ji My parents went to see Jatin at his house in March 2025 end. I was in Germany that time and was coming back to India. We talked for this first time over phone on 31 March 2025. We did a video call with parents the next day. We liked each other and I flew from Bangalore to chandigarh on Thursday 3 April to meet him in person. We met and got rokafied on 4 April 2025. My parents wanted to do the marriage as early as possible but he needed some time. Our marriage date got finalized for 19 May 2025. Few days before our marriage there was India Pakistan war going on. We were not sure if we will be able to proceed with our marriage plans. Eventually the war got stopped and we got married. The courtship period for us was very less. I came back to Bangalore in June. For the next 3 months Jatin came to Bangalore to meet me for few days. He came to Bangalore even on my birthday. During his trip to Bangalore we went visited Mysore and coorg. He really liked coorg because of the waterfalls. Whenever I miss him, I wear the watch he had gifted me. He sends me flowers, brocolli and cauliflower and I send him chocolates and protein bar on our month anniversaries. We go for walk in the evenings together whenever I am with him, either in Bangalore or in Panchkula. I have adopted his lifestyle starting from using the same brand toothpaste to things he eats or the night time skin care routine. I have changed all the things for him. The first time he came to Bangalore I made sure he feels like home. I bought the cosmetics he use, the vitamins he takes, the soap he uses, the things he need for daily purposes, everything. His birthday is on 2nd Jan. He likes to watch dark movies, I am a fan of korean drama.

Hindi-English The song is for My Husband Abhijit Somavanshi from wife Sapana Somavanshi We call each other Baby I call him Abhi Jaan Handsome Panda Babu He calles my cute little bachha sweetie drama queen From the very first day we met on 1st December 2024, in that arranged-marriage setup, life quietly started writing its own fairytale for us. We were complete opposites‚Äîhim, calm, composed, mature, funny, and deeply responsible‚Ä¶ and me, a bubbly, sensitive, moody, soft-hearted girl. But somehow, two different worlds fit together so perfectly that sometimes it doesn‚Äôt even feel like an arranged marriage. It feels like destiny‚Ä¶ like we were always meant to find each other. Even in this long-distance phase‚Äîhe in Pune, I in Mumbai‚Äîour love never once felt distant. Meeting only on weekends still feels like meeting every day, because he is present in everything I do, everything I feel. I talk endlessly, and he listens with that soft smile. He may be shy with the world, but with me, he is the most expressive man‚Äîshowing love, care, and affection in ways that make my heart melt. And when he calls me a kid or treats me like one, yet also trusts my maturity‚Ä¶ that‚Äôs where our magic lies. We had our ups and downs, moments of distance and misunderstandings, but we could never stay away. One of us always chose calm, chose love, chose to fix things‚Äîbecause living without talking to each other felt impossible. He fell in love first, but now‚Ä¶ I love him with a depth even words cannot hold. He is no longer just a part of my life‚Äîhe is my life. He cares for me, understands me, supports me, and loves me in exactly the way I always dreamt someone would. He is emotionally available, gentle, grounded, and mine. The best thing about us is how we find joy in the smallest gestures‚Äîlittle expressions of love that mean more than grand moments. And how quickly we resolve our fights‚Ä¶ because at the end of the day, we both choose each other again and again. I feel like the luckiest girl alive to call him my husband. On his birthday‚Äîhis first birthday with me as his wife‚ÄîI want to tell him this: Happy Birthday, my love. My calm to my chaos, my peace to my storms, my happiness, my strength, my forever. Here‚Äôs to your first birthday with me, and to a lifetime of birthdays together. I love you more than words, more than time, more than everything

Hindi This song is for dipak, my muffin from me Saloni - his cupcake. It‚Äôs for his birthday I met him unexpectedly. Conversation became regular. And one fine day I decided to go visit him because he stays in Pune. I made him short note and a mini canvas painting. But what he had planned was unexpected. He hid roses in his house for me. Everytime I would find one one rose here and there. He kept surprise ready for me in other room with flower bouquet huge teddy,cute panda and a letter. His honesty made my eyes teary. That bye after first meet was very difficult. I cried because I didn‚Äôt know I would meet annd form such a beautiful bond with him. He feels like my fictional character in my real life. Our story was never meant to be ordinary. We both walked into it carrying broken pieces ‚Äî shattered trust, old heartbreaks, and the fear of feeling too much again. But somehow‚Ä¶ in each other‚Äôs presence, something healed. Something softened. We met unexpectedly, two people who weren‚Äôt looking for anything serious ‚Äî just conversation, just a distraction. But he became much more than that. He became the warmth I didn‚Äôt know I still deserved. Our connection grew in small, honest moments ‚Äî the way he cooked butter chicken for me while singing and dancing in the kitchen, the surprise letters he wrote, when he makes chai he keep malai aside for me because one day I had told him that I like malai in my chai - he thought I wouldn‚Äôt notice, the gajra he tucked gently into my hair, the rose bouquets he kept bringing without reason. And it‚Äôs been 6 months still he does. the way he clicked my pictures like he wanted to freeze time. He made me feel like a poem ‚Äî like something fragile, and precious, and worth loving. We had our morning rides, sunrise moments, movie dates, chai in balconies, handwritten notes hidden in trekking bags, him feeding me when I said ‚ÄòI‚Äôm done‚Äô, me wearing his T-shirt in the cinema hall, and both of us pretending we weren‚Äôt falling deeper every day. We‚Äôre not defined. We don‚Äôt know where this goes. We keep telling ourselves we‚Äôre temporary‚Ä¶ but our moments feel anything but temporary. He tells me he‚Äôs broken. I tell him I am too. Maybe that‚Äôs why it feels like our souls recognise each other in ways we can‚Äôt explain. This song is for him ‚Äî the boy who became my safe place without promising forever, the boy who brought back my laughter, my softness, my belief in love, the boy who made even our imperfect, uncertain story feel like the most beautiful thing I‚Äôve ever lived. If our love is incomplete, it‚Äôs still the kind that will stay with me forever.so Thnk you for being in my life your presence matters the most. U healed something that you didn‚Äôt break. That‚Äôs the selfless thing anyone can do.

language: Hindi High priority This is a song from Me to my fiance So Pratik and I met through our families. We first met on February 28th,2025 and spoke for almost 3 hours. I was a complete yapper and let my guard down and he too spoke a lot about himself with all honesty which made me feel at ease and very comfortable around him. I knew it right then that he was the one for me. After our first meet we thought we would meet again but it never happened. Time passed and towards march end I went on a trip to Paris with my bestfriend and somewhere in second week of April he went on a trip to London with his friends while we two were living a completely different life at different places destiny was planning a different and beautiful plan for us. We again met each other on April 23rd, 2025 and said a YES. There was some kind of magic that just unfolded. Initially it took us a little time to get comfortable around each other but with each passing day, with every argument, with every happy memory we got closer and closer. Our love and respect for each other increased immensely. He‚Äôs handled all my mood swings like a pro king and understood me like no one else could. He‚Äôs healed me in ways that I can‚Äôt even think of. His love has brought so much joy into my life. His care and concern is something that no one can match. His honesty and sincerity is something that brings so much peace into my life and it is something that makes me fall in love with him even more every single day. Right from coming to visit me when I got my periods he got me really beautiful white roses. Just when RCB won he won my heart too because as RCB won he came straight to my house and shared that joy with me. Every kiss of his takes me to a dream land. Every video call with him in the night and through the day is the most precious thing and that brings a wide smile on my face. Him sleeping on video calls to making the silliest faces to cheer me up is extremely adorable. His every ‚Äúmunna bhai and gundi‚Äù makes me laugh out loud. Just listening to him sing brings me joy. His hugs became tighter with each passing day and now it doesn‚Äôt even feel like an arranged marriage anymore it literally feels like we are doing a love marriage and have known each other for years. I‚Äôm the luckiest to have found him, I‚Äôm so so so blessed to have him by my side. I want to promise him that I‚Äôm going to be there for him, I‚Äôll love with him with every cell in my body, I want to take care of him and protect him in every way I can. He is the most precious boy in this world. He makes my heart smile and eyes shine. I want to ask you that ‚Äú are you ready to get old with me and have the most beautiful life ahead of us‚Äù? I love you. Thank you for coming into my life.
